Our Menu Catering Services Available Quality, fresh ingredients catering Your Private Party Spot Host your next party with us parties previous slide next slide Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 slideshow start stop playing BOOK AN EVENT Your Private Party Spot For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we'll be in touch soon. parties REVIEWS Review by - Yelp Scott E: This place has real Indian food, and it is fresh and delicious. Best I have had in Charleston by far. Very good, great, scrumptious. People come here to dine from far away regularly -- that is how good it is. Review by - Yelp Kenny S: My wife and I went to Naan tonight and we were not disappointed one bit! The restaurant itself is super cool and has a modern hipsterish vibe to it with a very cool bar right by the entrance. The waitstaff was super attentive with multiple people checking in on us at different times making sure everything was alright without being overbearing Review by - Yelp Holli A: My daughter talked me into eating here, as it was my first time ever eating Indian cuisine. I wasn't sure what to order so we just got the buffet. Everything I tried was really good and I was impressed. Review by - Yelp Joanne B: We ate dinner here and everything was amazing. We had Chicken 65 for an appetizer. It was full of flavor, tender and just a little spicy. We had Seekh Kebab and Dal Makhani. Both were tasty and perfectly prepared. The service was spot-on and the restaurant is so clean! Everyone was very nice. Also, order the garlic naan.
